overview: Noah The New Year 2023 was a professional wrestling event promoted by CyberFight's sub-brand Pro Wrestling Noah. It took place on Janaury 1, 2023, in Tokyo, Japan, at the Nippon Budokan. The event aired on CyberAgent's AbemaTV online linear television service and CyberFight's streaming service Wrestle Universe.  The show's main event portraited the final Noah appearance of The Great Muta as he faced WWE's Shinsuke Nakamura.
title: NOAH: The New Year 2023
